rows.label: bf11680100_0010
rows.name: Metsu is heading for Iira's core

rows.label: bf11680100_0020
rows.name:
In the original configuration,
the core is in the Divine Beast's thorax.

rows.label: bf11680100_0030
rows.name: But the Divine Beast hasn't shown signs of transforming yet...

rows.label: bf11680100_0040
rows.name:
You think the Grail is taking...a nap,
or something?

rows.label: bf11680100_0050
rows.name: That would be fortunate for us...

rows.label: bf11680100_0060
rows.name:
That mountain ridge makes up the upper body.
That's where the core should appear...

rows.label: bf11680100_0070
rows.name: It will take some time before the troops are organized.

rows.label: bf11680100_0075
rows.name: Let us go on ahead. We depart in the morning.
